entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 30 km/h then southwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 7. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
